title: Feature Extractor Regression
description: In this video, I use ml5's feature extractor and re-train the MobileNet model to output a "regression" controlling a slider.

timestamps.title: Change code to from classify to predict

codeExamples.title: Feature Extractor Regression
codeExamples.description: This sketch demonstrates how to retrain the MobileNet model to output regression results.

links.title: Pong ml5.js
links.description: An experimental version of the famous computer game Pong that aims to educate users on how machine learning tasks are trained through a fun gaming experience.

links.title: Interacting with Sliders
links.description: This video looks at how we can add some interactivity to a webpage with sliders, buttons and text inputs to change elements in the canvas or even in the DOM using the p5.js library.
